metadata.title: CVE-2017-9763 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The grub_ext2_read_block function in fs/ext2.c in GNU GRUB before 2013-11-12, as used in shlr/grub/fs/ext2.c in radare2 1.5.0, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (excessive stack use and application crash) via a crafted binary file, related to use of a variable-size stack array.

criterions.comment: grub2 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.02~beta3-4ubuntu5').
